sentences.en: ...digestive juices that normally work on breaking down our food.
sentences.cn: …通常用于分解食物的消化液。

sentences.en: A disruption of any part of the digestive system upsets the whole system.
sentences.cn: 其中一部分发生紊乱将会影响整个消化系统.

sentences.en: Autolysis The self - destruction of cells by digestive enzyme activity.
sentences.cn: 自溶现象:通过消化酶的活力来破坏自己细胞的现象.

sentences.en: Besides, the digestive juices didn't leave much of the flesh to work with.
sentences.cn: 另外, 消化液离开了人体是无法起作用的.

sentences.en: Digestive disturbances are common in infections with all the stomach worms.
sentences.cn: 消化障碍是各种胃线虫感染的常见症状.

sentences.en: Foods are broken down in the digestive tract.
Fortunately, I have a comfortable excess productive capacity for my digestive juices.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是, 我拥有轻松地生产过剩消化液的能力.

sentences.en: He has suffered from a disorder of the digestive system.
Instruments developed at the hospital allow doctors to thread microscopic telescopes into the digestive tract.
sentences.cn: 医院开发研制的仪器使医生们得以将显微内镜伸入消化道。

sentences.en: Large meals overload the digestive system.
sentences.cn: 吃得太饱会加重消化系统的负担。

sentences.en: Most cells of the pancreas produce digestive enzymes.
sentences.cn: 胰腺的大部分细胞产生酶.

sentences.en: Peppermint oil is very good for regulating digestive disorders.
sentences.cn: 薄荷油能很有效地调节消化系统失调。

sentences.en: These structural compounds are difficult for the digestive system of the pig to deal with.
sentences.cn: 猪的消化系统要消化这种结构的化合物是困难的.

sentences.en: Too rich a diet will disorder his digestive.
sentences.cn: 太油腻的饮食会使他的消化系统变得紊乱.

sentences.en: Too rich a diet will disorder your digestive system.
sentences.cn: 过分油腻的饮食会使你的消化系统失调.

sentences.en: Your body makes 22 digestive enzymes that help break down food.
sentences.cn: 你的身体能够产生22种消化酶从而帮助消化食物.

words.tran_cn: 做摘要者；助消化食品；汇编者；蒸炼器

trans.tran_en: connected with the process of digestion
